transcript:
that those broad- boned reddish hands with hairy wrists visible from under the shirt sleeves, those hands which he loved and hated, held him in their power. 
"Six hundred rubles, ace, a corner, a nine . . . winning it back's impossible . . . Oh, how pleasant it was at home I . . . The knave, double or quits ... it can't bel . . . And why is he doing this to me?" Rostov pondered. Sometimes he staked a large sum, but Drilokhov refused to accept it and fixed the stake himself. Nicholas
